name: Project Solutions Group
overview: Project Solutions Group, Inc. provides project management and training services. It offers custom tailored solutions, which include Enterprise Project Management that helps in deploying Microsoft’s project management tools to streamline and coordinate project-based initiatives across organization; PMI Training that offer PMI-aligned courses, delivering measurable improvements in project management performance; and Project Management Consulting, which provides the controls, tools, methodologies, and experience need to support all project-based initiatives, alleviating or eliminating the scope creep, cost overruns, and delays that can derail any project. The company serves aerospace and defense, business services, computer hardware and software, consumer products manufacturing, education, electric utilities, health care products, and industrial manufacturing. It has strategic partnership with EPK Group. Project Solutions Group was founded in 2001 and is based in Marlborough, Massachusetts. As of July 7, 2009, Project Solutions Group Inc. operates as a subsidiary of RCM Technologies Inc.

acquisition.source_description: RCM Technologies acquires Project Solutions Group
